// Read input
//val streamPath = "SM4UD805D54ISH_ORGPUIDTENANTID_0510.ss"
val streamPath = "SM4UB5FCIPRW3O_ORGPUIDTENANTID_0630.ss"
val inputPath = "/mnt/tmp/test/druid/" + streamPath // streamPath
val firstDf = spark.read.format("csv").load("abfss://adlsgen2fs@irisadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse/workspaces/iris-synapse-ws/data/fhvhv_tripdata_2020-06.csv")
val sketch1: ThetaSketchJavaSerializable = computeSketch(firstDf)
printSketchSize(sketch1)
System.out.println("Unique count1: " + sketch1.getEstimate)


//val streamPath2 = "SM4UDAXP91VEH2_ORGPUIDTENANTID_0350.ss"
val streamPath2 = "SM4UD805D54ISH_ORGPUIDTENANTID_0510.ss"
val inputPath2 = "/mnt/tmp/test/druid/" + streamPath2 // streamPath
val secondDf = spark.read.format("csv").load("abfss://adlsgen2fs@irisadlsgen2.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse/workspaces/iris-synapse-ws/data/fhvhv_tripdata_2020-11.csv")
val sketch2: ThetaSketchJavaSerializable = computeSketch(secondDf)
printSketchSize(sketch2)
System.out.println("Unique count2: " + sketch2.getEstimate)

intersect(sketch1, sketch2)
